001package src.pkg_commands;
002
003/**
004 * Representations for all the valid command words for the game
005 * along with a description string and corresponding commands.
006 * 
007 * @author Pierre MATAR
008 */
009public enum CommandWord
010{
011    GO("go", new GoCommand()), 
012    QUIT("quit", new QuitCommand()), 
013    HELP("help", new HelpCommand()), 
014    LOOK("look", new LookCommand()), 
015    EAT("eat", new EatCommand()),
016    BACK("back", new BackCommand()), 
017    TEST("test", new TestCommand()), 
018    TAKE("take", new TakeCommand()), 
019    DROP("drop", new DropCommand()), 
020    ITEMS("items", new ItemsCommand()), 
021    UNKNOWN("?", new UnknownCommand()), 
022    FIX("fix", new FixCommand()), 
023    CHARGE("charge", new ChargeCommand()), 
024    FIRE("fire", new FireCommand()), 
025    ALEA("alea", new AleaCommand()),
026    INTERACT("interact", new InteractCommand());
027    
028    
029    // The command string.
030    private String aCommandString;
031    private Command aCommand;
032    
033    /**
034     * Initialise with the corresponding command word and command.
035     * @param commandWord The command string.
036     * @param pCommand The command object.
037     */
038    CommandWord(final String pCommandString, final Command pCommand)
039    {
040        this.aCommandString = pCommandString;
041        this.aCommand = pCommand;
042    }
043    
044    /**
045     * @return The command word as a string.
046     */
047    public String getDescription()
048    {
049        return this.aCommandString;
050    }
051    
052    /**
053     * @return The command instance.
054    */
055    public Command getCommand() {
056        return this.aCommand;
057    }
058}
